Free Shipping & Returns

All orders over $49 ship for FREE in the contiguous United States. Contact a Lighting Expert for international shipping options.

Unless otherwise noted, we also offer free returns on regularly shipped items. We will accept returned freight orders, however, the customer is responsible for the return freight charges.

Call a Lighting Expert 7 days a week, 8am to midnight for best pricing on ALL BRANDS: 866-344-3875!
